title: Legolas, Elven Comrade (4C74)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Elf
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Archer. Skirmish: Exert Legolas to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 (or -2 if that companion is Gimli).
Lore:	”'Come, you shall sit behind me, friend Gimli.'”
Rarity:	C
